## Placement type

Where to add the new item into the layout when using the [FoundationLayout.addItem()](./foundation-layout.foundationlayout.additem.md) API

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type Placement = {
    area: 'top' | 'left' | 'bottom' | 'right';
};
```
